memberdef.name: make_nbf_tables

memberdef.argsstring: (int ftype1, int ftype2, const gmx_mtop_t *mtop, int *ncount, int **count)
memberdef.name: count_tables

briefdescription.para: If there's bonded interactions of type ftype1 or ftype2 present in the topology, build an array of the number of interactions present for each bonded interaction index found in the topology.

detaileddescription.para: ftype1 or ftype2 may be set to -1 to disable seeking for a valid type with that parameter.

count will be reallocated as necessary to fit the largest bonded interaction index found, and its current size will be returned in ncount. It will contain zero for every bonded interaction index for which no interactions are present in the topology.

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fplog, int ftype1, int ftype2, const gmx_mtop_t *mtop, const t_filenm *tabbfnm, const char *tabext)
memberdef.name: make_bonded_tables

briefdescription.para: If there's bonded interactions of flavour tabext and type ftype1 or ftype2 present in the topology, seek them in the list of filenames passed to mdrun, and make bonded tables from those files.

detaileddescription.para: ftype1 or ftype2 may be set to -1 to disable seeking for a valid type with that parameter.
A fatal error occurs if no matching filename is found.

memberdef.argsstring: (t_forcerec *fr, int ncg_home, int ncg_force, int natoms_force, int natoms_force_constr, int natoms_f_novirsum)

The force calculation needs information on which atoms it should do work.
fr
The forcerec
ncg_home
Number of charge groups on this processor
ncg_force
Number of charge groups to compute force on
natoms_force
Number of atoms to compute force on
natoms_force_constr
Number of atoms involved in constraints
natoms_f_novirsum
Number of atoms for which force is to be compute but no virial

The Force rec struct must be created with mk_forcerec.
fplog
File for printing

fr
The forcerec

ir
Inputrec structure
mtop
Molecular topology
cr
Communication structures
